Message:
To be born into a family of
samurai means that mastery
of the blade is inevitable.

Even for me, ’twas natural
to choose this path,
yet I was met with my father
and brothers’ frigid gazes.

All I wanted was to be praised,
to be acknowledged.

That made me pour
myself into my training,
yet it gained me nothing.

When fate’s tides swept
everything away from me,
all that remained was
an emptiness too vast to fill.

At the end of my travels,
only one person took me in—
the Duke.

To repay his kindness in full,
I must protect him at all costs.

But, with my blade having lost
so much of its edge, I cannot.
Nor can I lay claim
to stand by his side.

“One’s worth lies in
the strength of their blade.”

Yes. That’s why
I must grow stronger.
Ever stronger...!
